function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Detection of SARS-CoV-2 RNA on object surfaces in a hospital isolation ward","Impact":"Potential for transmission of COVID-19 from contaminated surfaces","Mitigation":"Improved disinfection protocols and increased hygiene compliance","Technologies":"Advanced disinfectant sprays, UV sterilization, and antimicrobial coatings","People":"Patients, hospital staff, visitors","Owner":"Hospital management, infection control team"},{"Description":"Positive stool specimen for SARS-CoV-2 RNA in patient with mechanical ventilation","Impact":"Potential for fecal-oral transmission of COVID-19 within hospital setting","Mitigation":"Enhanced sanitation and waste management practices, including proper disposal of contaminated materials","Technologies":"High-efficiency waste disposal systems, advanced sanitation equipment, and sewage treatment processes","People":"Patients, hospital staff, visitors","Owner":"Hospital management, infection control team"},{"Description":"High hand hygiene compliance of staff and effectiveness of disinfection measures in isolation wards","Impact":"Reduction of COVID-19 transmission risk among staff and patients","Mitigation":"Continued emphasis on hand hygiene, regular disinfection of surfaces, and staff training","Technologies":"Touchless hand sanitizers, self-disinfecting surfaces, and UV-C disinfection systems","People":"Hospital staff, patients","Owner":"Hospital management, infection control team"}]}
